description:
Historically, 72% of all the deaths in London are related to dragons, fantastical beings invisible to the majority of the people. While unknown to most, some people have been standing up to these dragons.

Only inhabitants of Reverse London who live in the hidden "reverse" side of London can see the dragons. Even then, only a selected few become qualified enough as witches or wizards to make direct contact with them.

The protagonists of the story are witch duo Noel Niihashi and Ninny Spangcole. They are protection agents for Wing Bind (WB), an organization for dragon conservation and management. Their mission is to protect and manage the dragons within London on behalf of the people.

(Source: Official Site)

Note: The show was screened in theaters and released online on the same date; the theatrical release combines all three episodes into one.

tags.name: Witch
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Steampunk
tags.description: Prominently features technology and designs inspired by 19th-century industrial steam-powered machinery.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/chau_kotori)

Graduated from Kyoto Seika University in 2012. Japanese animator, director and storyboard artist. Leader and founder of Studio Colorido's Team Yamahitsuji since fall 2018.
Keiji Inai is a Japanese composer and arranger affiliated with the music production company IMAGINE.
_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/151217/)._
_Note: Not to be confused with the [illustrator](https://anilist.co/staff/122887/)._
Previously affiliated with [Team Yamahitsuji](https://anilist.co/studio/6414/Team-Yamahitsuji). Currently affiliated with [ufotable](https://anilist.co/studio/43/ufotable).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/seijinthomas)

A british/japanese animator currently working at animation studio OLM on Japan.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/4057799954)

Graduated from [Tama Art University](https://anilist.co/studio/6939/Tama-Art-University) in 2016 and joined [Studio Colorido](https://anilist.co/studio/4419/Studio-Colorido).
